DOC.brief_summary: Bilateral laryngeal reinnervation induces a rise in laryngeal resistance and speech alteration. The aim of this study is to propose laryngeal reinnervation by a phrenic nerve root to patients with bilateral laryngeal paralysis.
DOC.criteria: Bilateral laryngeal paralysis without any amelioration for six months Laryngeal paralysis more than 3 years Arycricoideus ankylostosis Pacemaker Pregnancy
